Name: _LanguageNative
Comment: Language name in the native language

Name: _LanguageCode
Comment: standard windows os language code this pack represents (can be primary code only ie. en or primary-secondary ie. en-GB)

Name: $win_IDEMenuViews
Comment: Windows version of the views menu entry

Name: $mac_IDEMenuViews
Comment: Mac version of the views menu entry

Name: $linux_IDEMenuViews
Comment: Linux version of the views menu entry

Name: IDETooltip_LaptopMode_Description
English: In Laptop Mode you can pan, scroll and zoom by moving the mouse over an area\nwhile holding ${LaptopLZoomKey} to zoom and Left Alt to pan and scroll.\nUse ${LaptopRHSKeys} for non-mouse interactions while Laptop Mode is enabled.
Translation: In modalità laptop è possibile spostarsi, scorrere e ingrandire spostando il mouse su un’area\ne tenendo premuto ${LaptopLZoomKey} per ingrandire o Alt sinistro per spostarsi e scorrere.\n${LaptopRHSKeys} consente le interazioni senza mouse quando è attiva la modalità laptop.

Name: IDE_FatalErrorTitle
Comment: Title for the fatal error warning dialog

Name: IDE_FatalErrorWarning
English: GameMaker has become unstable.\nPlease save changes and exit.
Translation: GameMaker è diventato instabile.\nSalva le modifiche ed esci.
Comment: Warn the user they should try saving changes and exit

Name: IDE_FolderPermsWarning
Dialog_CopyToClipboard
Comment: Copy the dialog message to the clipboard

Name: IDE_SteamVersionInfo
Comment: the ide version information string when running from steam

Name: UpdateDialogDownloadNow
Comment: Update new version dialog - download now button

Name: UpdateDialogRemindMe
Comment: Update new version dialog - remind me later button

Name: UpdateDialogLabel
English: New version is available! \nYou are on v{0}\nNew version is {1}
Translation: È disponibile una nuova versione! \nLa versione attuale è v{0}\nLa nuova versione è {1}
Comment: Update new version dialog - tell user which version they are on and which version update will take them to

Name: UpdateDialogReleaseNotes
Comment: Update new version dialog - view release notes button

Name: RSS_Download_Exception
English: Could not reach the RSS feed
Comment: A message which is shown when the RSS feed is not accessible

Name: Dialog_DontShowAgain
Comment: Message next to checkbox to allow the user to choose not to see this popup in future

Name: Runtime_Installing_Version
Comment: user facing splash screen message for installing runtime

Name: ImageEditor_SelectAll
Comment: Image editor select all menu option

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_Test
Comment: the teset platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_android
Comment: the android platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_HTML5
Comment: the html5 platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_Linux
Comment: the linux platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_operagx
Comment: the opera gx platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_ps4
Comment: the ps4 platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_ps5
Comment: the ps5 platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_Windows
Comment: the windows platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_xboxseriesxs
Comment: the Xbox One & Series X/S platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_Mac
Comment: the mac platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_ios
Comment: the apple iOS platform title in the platform selection list

Name: TargetSelection_Platform_tvos
Comment: the apple tvOS platform title in the platform selection list

Name: ProgressBar_Install
Comment: the progress bar caption while installing

Name: UserLogin_NoRuntime
English: Unable to access the Runtime Feed and no local Runtime installed. Please check your internet connection and start GameMaker again.
Translation: Non è possibile accedere al feed runtime e non è installato un runtime locale. Controlla la tua connessione a Internet e riavvia GameMaker.

Name: UserLogin_RuntimeSpaceWarningMessage
English: Destination drive {0} has only {1} GB free space available.\nAt least 2 GB of free space is recommended - please ensure there is enough free space available before proceeding.
Translation: L’unità di destinazione {0} dispone soltanto di {1} GB di spazio libero.\nLo spazio libero raccomandato è di almeno 2 GB - prima di procedere, verifica che sia disponibile uno spazio libero sufficiente.

Name: UserLogin_MaxDevice
English: Maximum logins exceeded \nYou can manage your account sessions at accounts.yoyogames.com
Translation: È stato superato il numero massimo di accessi \nPuoi gestire le sessioni del tuo account in accounts.yoyogames.com

Name: User_OK
Comment: User Login - two step authentication ok button

Name: runtime_onstartup_change
English: Do you want to change your current runtime to the matching IDE version {0}?
Translation: Vuoi cambiare il runtime corrente alla versione corrispondente dell’IDE {0}?
Comment: Change current runtime to the version matching the IDE

Name: runtime_dns_ResolvingFailed
Translation: La risoluzione DNS non è riuscita
Comment: A title of the warning which is shown when after the IDE failed to resolve an address against an alternative DNS

Name: runtime_dns_ResolvingFailedMessage
English: Could not resolve {0} with an alternative DNS. A system DNS has been used
Translation: Impossibile risolvere {0} con un DNS alternativo. È stato utilizzato un DNS di sistema
Comment: Could not use an alternative DNS
